name: SURVIVE GameJam Submission: Dungeon Escape
description:
Try out this simple puzzle game where you have to go through various small maps with twists to the game and reach the end!
Hope you have fun trying it out! :D

This is a simple test game entry for the GameJam that's supposed to accommodate the theme of: The rules change as you play.

This was made by a team of two people:

  • Saumya Saraswat
  • Deshna Thakur
